languages.text: Вернувшись в очередной раз, Ирлиэт застала элантаха на смертном одре — поиски ее затянулись на незаметные для эльдар десятки лет. Последние дни Ирлиэт провела с {mf|ним|ней}, а когда смерть возложила длань на плечо Вольного Торговца — в последний раз погрузилась в {mf|его|ее} мир. И вновь молод{mf|ой|ая} элантах смотрел{mf||а} на нее и улыбал{mf|ся|ась}. Слезы обожгли кожу эльдарки, а затем тусклый свет человеческой души угас. Ирлиэт прикоснулась к руке элантаха, чтобы проверить {mf|его|ее} пульс. Закрыла глаза. Вздохнула. И навсегда покинула протекторат фон Валанциус.

One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

Последние дни Ирлиэт провела с {mf|ним|ней}, а когда смерть возложила длань на плечо Вольного Торговца — в последний раз погрузилась в {mf|его|ее} мир. traits.locale_text: One day Yrliet returned to find elantach on a death's bed — her search took decades, yet decades pass unnoticeably for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the last days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time has come for death to put its palm on the shoulder of the Rogue Trader, she dove into {mf|his|her} world one last time. And once again the young elantach looked at her with a smile. Tears burned the Aeldari's skin, and the dim light of a human soul faded. For the first time, Yrliet touched the elantach hand to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes. Sighed. And left the von Valancuis protectorate forever.

One day Yrliet returned to find elantach on a death's bed — her search took decades, yet decades pass unnoticeably for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the last days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time has come for death to put its palm on the shoulder of the Rogue Trader, she dove into {mf|his|her} world one last time. For the first time, Yrliet touched the elantach hand to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes. Sighed. And left the von Valancuis protectorate forever.

The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

languages.text: 某天，伊莉耶特终于回到了外界人身边，却发现{mf|他|她}已行将就木。原来，她已经花了数十年的时间寻找灵魂石，而她自己却对此浑然未觉。伊莉耶特与外界人一起度过了最后的时光，当行商浪人最终迎来大限之日时，她最后一次进入了{mf|他|她}的世界。再度年轻的外界人站在那里，微笑着，看着她。滚烫的泪水灼痛了伊莉耶特的皮肤，在那之后，人类灵魂的黯淡光芒便永远熄灭了。伊莉耶特碰了碰外界人的手腕，检查了{mf|他|她}的脉搏，随后闭上眼睛，叹了口气，离开了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，再也没有回来。
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

traits.locale_text: 某天，伊莉耶特终于回到了外界人身边，却发现{mf|他|她}已行将就木。原来，她已经在内心世界度过了数十年，而她却对此浑然未觉。伊莉耶特与外界人一起度过了最后的时光，当死亡最终找上行商浪人时，她最后一次进入了{mf|他|她}的世界。再度年轻的外界人站在那里，微笑地看着她。滚烫的泪水灼烧了伊莉耶特的皮肤，在那之后，人类灵魂的暗淡光芒便永远熄灭了。伊莉耶特碰了碰外界人的手腕，检查了{mf|他|她}的脉搏，随后闭上眼睛，叹了口气，离开了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，再也没有回来。

languages.text: Eines Tages kehrte Yrliet zurück und fand den Elantach auf dem Sterbebett vor — ihre Suche hatten Jahrzehnte gedauert, doch Jahrzehnte vergehen für Aeldari völlig unbemerkt. Yrliet verbrachte die letzten Tage des Elantachs mit ihm, und als der Tod dann seine Hand auf die Schulter {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} legte, versank sie ein letztes Mal in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Welt. Der Elantach, wieder jung, blickte sie lächelnd an. Tränen verbrannten Yrliets Haut, und dann erlosch das trübe Licht der menschlichen Seele. Yrliet berührte das Handgelenk des Elantachs, um nach seinem Puls zu fühlen. Sie schloss die Augen, seufzte und verließ das Protektorat von Valancius für immer.
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

traits.locale_text: Eines Tages kehrte Yrliet zurück und fand den Elantach auf dem Sterbebett vor — ihre Suche hatten Jahrzehnte gedauert, doch Jahrzehnte vergehen für Aeldari völlig unbemerkt. Yrliet verbrachte die letzten Tage des Elantachs mit ihm, und als der Tod dann seine Hand auf die Schulter {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} legte, betrat sie ein letztes Mal {mf|seine|ihre} Welt. Der Elantach, wieder jung, blickte sie lächelnd an. Tränen verbrannten Yrliets Haut, und dann erlosch das trübe Licht der menschlichen Seele. Yrliet berührte das Handgelenk des Elantachs, um nach seinem Puls zu fühlen. Sie schloss die Augen, seufzte und verließ das Protektorat von Valancius für immer.

languages.text: Un jour, à son retour, Yrliet trouva l'elantach sur son lit de mort. Sa quête avait duré des dizaines d'années, un bref laps de temps pour une Aeldari, mais pas pour {mf|un humain|une humaine}. Elle resta aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pendant ses derniers jours, et quand la mort vint {mf|le|la} chercher, elle s'enfonça dans son monde une dernière fois. Sa jeunesse retrouvée, l'elantach la regarda en souriant. Les yeux rougis, Yrliet contempla la faible lueur de l'âme humaine s'estomper. Elle toucha le poignet de l'elantach à la recherche de son pouls, puis ferma les yeux, soupira et quitta le protectorat von Valancius pour toujours.
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

traits.locale_text: Un jour, à son retour, Yrliet trouva l'elantach sur son lit de mort. Sa quête avait duré des dizaines d’années, un bref laps de temps pour une Aeldari, mais pas pour {mf|un humain|une humaine}. Elle reste aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pendant ses derniers jours, et quand la mort vint {mf|le|la} chercher, elle entra dans son monde une dernière fois. Sa jeunesse retrouvée, l'elantach la regarda avec un sourire. Les yeux rougis, Yrliet contempla la faible lueur de l'âme humaine s'estomper. Elle toucha le poignet de l'elantach à la recherche de son pouls, puis ferma les yeux, soupira et quitta le protectorat von Valancius pour toujours.

languages.text: Un día, Yrliet volvió para encontrar a su elantach en su lecho de muerte. Su búsqueda le había llevado décadas, pero las décadas pueden pasar en un suspiro para los Aeldari. Yrliet pasó los últimos días de{mf|l| la} elantach a su lado, y, cuando llegó la hora de que la muerte posara su fría mano sobre el hombro de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se sumergió en su mundo por última vez. {mf|El|La} elantach, otra vez joven, la miró con una sonrisa. El ardor de las lágrimas castigó la piel de Yrliet, y después la luz tenue del alma humana se desvaneció. Yrliet tocó la muñeca de{mf|l| la} elantach para comprobar su pulso. Cerró los ojos, suspiró y abandonó para siempre el protectorado von Valancius.
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

Yrliet pasó los últimos días de{mf|l| la} elantach a su lado, y, cuando llegó la hora de que la muerte posara su fría mano sobre el hombro de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, entró en su mundo por última vez. {mf|El|La} elantach, otra vez joven, la miró con una sonrisa. El ardor de las lágrimas castigó la piel de Yrliet, y después la luz tenue del alma humana se desvaneció. Yrliet tocó la muñeca de{mf|l| la} elantach para comprobar su pulso. Cerró los ojos, suspiró y abandonó para siempre el protectorado von Valancius.

languages.text: ある日、帰還したユリエットは死の床にあった。彼女の捜索に要したのは数十年だったが、アエルダリにとって、数十年など気付かぬうちに過ぎていく。ユリエットはエランタの最期の日々を{mf|彼|彼女}と共に過ごした。そして自由開拓者の肩に死が手を置く時が来たとき、彼女は最期にもう一度{mf|彼|彼女}の世界に飛び込んだ。若さを取り戻したエランタは笑顔で彼女を見つめる。涙がユリエットの肌を焼き、そして人の魂の光が消えた。ユリエットはエランタの手首に触れ、その脈拍を確認した。彼女は目を閉じ、ため息をつくと、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領を後にして、二度と戻ることはなかったと言う。
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

traits.locale_text: ある日、帰還したユリエットは死の床にあった。彼女の捜索に要したのは数十年だったが、アエルダリにとって、数十年など気付かぬうちに過ぎていく。ユリエットはエランタの最期の日々を{mf|彼|彼女}と共に過ごした。そして自由開拓者の肩に死が手を置く時が来たとき、彼女は最期にもう一度{mf|彼|彼女}の世界に飛び込んだ。若さを取り戻したエランタは笑顔で彼女を見つめる。涙がユリエットの肌を焼き、そして人の魂の光が消えた。ユリエットはエランタの手首に触れ、その脈拍を確認した。彼女は目を閉じ、ため息をつくと、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領を後にして、二度と戻ることはなかったと言う。

languages.text: Yrliet bir gün geri döndüğünde elantach'ı ölüm döşeğinde buldu. Aslında arayışı on yıllar sürmüş olsa da Aeldari için yıllar fazlasıyla hızlı geçer. Yrliet, elantach'ın son günlerinde onun yanında oldu ve eceli geldiğinde elini Hür Tacir'in omuzuna koyarak son bir kez daha onun dünyasına daldı. Yeniden gençleşen elantach, ona bakıp gülümsedi. Gözyaşları, Yrliet'in tenini yaktı. Sonrasında insan ruhunun loş ışığı soldu. Yrliet, nabzını kontrol etmek için elantach'ın bileğine dokundu. Gözlerini yumdu, iç çekti ve bir daha dönmemek üzere von Valancius protektorasından ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: One day, Yrliet returned to find the elantach on {mf|his|her} deathbed — her search had taken decades, yet decades pass without notice for Aeldari. Yrliet spent the elantach's final days with {mf|him|her}, and when the time came for death to place its hand on the Rogue Trader's shoulder, she sank into {mf|his|her} world one last time. The elantach, young again, looked at her and smiled. Tears burned Yrliet's skin, and then the dim light of the human soul faded. Yrliet touched the elantach's wrist to check {mf|his|her} pulse. She closed her eyes, sighed, and left the von Valancius protectorate, never to return.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet bir gün geri döndüğünde elantach'ı ölüm yatağında buldu. Arayışı on yıllar sürmüştü ancak Aeldari için yıllar fazlasıyla hızlı geçer. Yrliet, elantach'ın son günlerini onunla geçirdi ve ölüm vakti geldiğinde elini Hür Tacir'in omuzuna koyarak son bir kez daha onun dünyasına daldı. Elantach bir kez daha gençti. Ona bakıyor ve gülümsüyordu. Gözyalşarı Yrliet'in tenini yaktı ve ardından insan ruhunun loş ışığı soldu. Yrliet nabzını kontrol etmek için elantach'ın bileğine dokundu. Gözlerini yumdu, iç çekti ve bir daha dönmemek üzere von Valancius protektorasından ayrıldı.
